LanguageData.GoldDust.label: gold dust
LanguageData.GoldDust.description: The most seductive metal of them all. Gold dust is used as a ingredient in potion brewing. Not very strong.
LanguageData.JadeDust.label: jade dust
LanguageData.JadeDust.description: A beautiful, green dust. Jade dust is used as a ingredient in potion brewing. Not very strong.
LanguageData.PGlassBottle.label: glass bottle
LanguageData.PGlassBottle.description: A simple glass bottle used for brewing potions.
LanguageData.PlasteelDust.label: plasteel dust
LanguageData.PlasteelDust.description: Advanced spacer tech material brought to medieval times. Plasteel dust is used as a ingredient in potion brewing. Not very strong.
LanguageData.UraniumDust.label: uranium dust
LanguageData.UraniumDust.description: A dark dust. Uranium dust is used as a ingredient in potion brewing. Not very strong.
LanguageData.WindDaisyBloom.label: wind daisy bloom
LanguageData.WindDaisyBloom.description: Wind daisy bloom. A beautiful and magical plant used by the mages from long forgotten worlds.
LanguageData.WindDaisyDust.label: wind daisy dust
LanguageData.WindDaisyDust.description: Wind daisy dust is used as a ingredient in potion brewing.
